entities.name: griphook
entities.description: Griphook is a goblin who helps Harry, Ron, and Hermione. He is partially blind but more savage for that.

entities.name: bogrod
entities.description: Bogrod is a person who accepts the metal instruments from Griphook and must place his palm on the door of the vault.

entities.name: clankers
entities.description: Clankers are small metal instruments that make a long ringing noise when shaken, used to control the beast in the chamber.

entities.name: beast
entities.description: The beast is partially blind but more savage for that. It has learned what to expect when the Clankers come and will retreat when it hears the noise.

relationships.description: Griphook has the Clankers, which he uses to control the beast.
Bogrod must place his palm on the door of the vault after the beast retreats.
The beast expects pain when it hears the noise made by the Clankers, which causes it to retreat.
